Name: Blueprint Word
About the game: Blueprint Word - This is a puzzle game. The game provides a set of mechanisms, controlling which you need to make a word or even a whole sentence. The catch of the gameplay is that you need to calculate your actions, since you have a certain number of moves to complete the task. We support modern gaming technology and now you can enjoy a new, smooth gameplay with new graphics and features.
